summary: Changes the Vanilla Healingspells Fast Healing, Close Wounds and Grand Healing to HoTs. Optionally Respite-Perk does not longer recover Stamina, instead it doubles HoT-duration.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][u][b]Healing over Time[/b][/u][/size]


[size=5][b][u]Description[/u]
[/b][/size]
I did this Mod for my self, because in my opinion Healing in Skyrim is kind of overpowered.
Enemys have to one-hit you, else every amount of damage can be healed in one second.

[size=4][b]This Mod changes the Vanilla Healingspells 'Fast Healing'[/b][/size][size=4][b], 'Close Wounds' and 'Grand Healing' to HoTs
(->Healing over Time). [/b]
[/size]
[i]This means they won't heal their whole amount instantly after releasing the spell. Instead they need 5 seconds to release their whole effect.
This HoTs can not be stacked! If you cast a second Healingspell before another has finished, it will reset the duration of the spell.
Your character will have a subtile golden glow, as long as a Healingspell is active.
Also Sky-UI will show an Icon as long as it is active when its settings are right.[/i]


[size=4][b]In addition I changed the Respite-Perk[/b][/size][size=4][b] because it made every form of stamina-managment unnecessary![/b]
[/size]
[i]It now doubles the duration of 'Fast Healing', 'Close Wounds' and 'Grand Healing'.
[size=2]For the channeled Novice-Spell 'Healing' it now doubles the amount per second. [/size][/i][size=4][b][size=3]
[/size][/b][size=3](By request I added another file where Respite-Perk is untouched, Spellduration in this version can not be extended,
instead they will also recover stamina over time)[/size][b][size=3]
[/size]
Magicka-Cost is the same as in Vanilla, Healing-amount is also similar to Vanilla [/b][/size][i][size=4][b][/b][/size]
(a little less without Respite-Perk, a little more if you have it).
[/i]

[u][b]Respite[/b][/u] [i]Perk[/i]
Doubles the duration of your loaded Healingspells and the amount of your channeled Healingspell.

[u][b]Healling[/b][/u] [i]Novice Spell[/i]
Heals 7.5 points per Second. Respite-Perk doubles the amount per second.

[u][b]Fast Healing[/b][/u] [i]Apprentice Spell[/i]
Heals 10 points of Damage per Second for 5 Seconds. Respite-Perk doubles the duration.

[u][b]Close Wounds[/b][/u] [i]Adept Spell[/i]
Heals 20 points of Damage per Second for 5 Seconds. Respite-Perk doubles the duration.

[u][b]Grand Healing[/b][/u] [i]Expert Spell[/i]
Heals 30 points of Damage per Second for 5 Seconds. Respite-Perk doubles the duration.
(It does not longer heal allies nearby you)

[i]All the other Healingspells in the Game are left untouched, e.g. 'Heal Others'[/i]
[size=4]

[/size][size=5][u][b]Installation, Uninstallation & Compability[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4][b]Use NMM or similar, for manual Installation just drop "healing over time.esp" in your Skyrim/data-folder.[/b][/size]

This Mod is very leightweight and does not use any scripts.
It can be installed and uninstalled mid-game, even if you already have this spells.
Since the Respite-Perk does not apply a magic effect by itself, it also doesn't matter if you already got this perk.
[i](It is only there for Condition-Check, its mechanics is in the spells, I only changed the displayed description)[/i]

It is also partly compatible with other mods, which change the restoration tree, as long as they don't change the 4 Spells I editet.
In this case it is only important that the Respite-Perk is still there and is connected to the Restoration-Novice-Perk.
It is cleaned with TESVedit.


I recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30073/?]Immersive Potions[/url], this mod changes all Potions etc. to an unstackable '-over-Time'-effect.
[i]Note: Immersive Potions and the HoTs from this [/i][i]Mod can stack

[/i][/center]
author: JoeKa8
